/usr/bin/c++      CMakeFiles/word_peak.dir/source/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/word_peak.dir/source/signal_generator.cpp.o CMakeFiles/word_peak.dir/source/recorder.cpp.o CMakeFiles/word_peak.dir/source/taper.cpp.o CMakeFiles/word_peak.dir/source/transformer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/word_peak.dir/source/plot.cpp.o  -o word_peak -rdynamic -lsfml-graphics -lsfml-window -lsfml-system -lsfml-audio -lfftw3
